column4: I am trying to do a fresh install of 12.04 desktop and when it comes to selecting the partition there are none to select, i boot into live disc and created a partition with gpartion but it still does not see any
are your hard disks being properly detected by your bios, and what are they? IDE or SATA?
yes, SATA and I am able to create partitions when in the live disc version of ubunti
here is what i am talking about http://tinypic.com/r/2i7qtjm/6 and http://tinypic.com/r/5soz/6
